review.comment: They’re very flexible to make changes when we needed.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind words Kircher. We're glad that we could measure up to your expectation.

review.comment:
One of the best IT company in Chandigarh
Locality are too good
IT park 🏞️

Their other marketing team seems to be a scam. They wont provide me with the work when i have asked several times for it, yet they were happy to take my money. I hope someone of their legal or senior team reaches out to me.

Seo side is great. worked well for years.
I wish, I could rate them zero, unfortunate Google does not allow  me to do it. My suggestions to all clients not work with them, I'll call it a factory, not an organization.
review.review_reply:
Hi Rohit, thank you for your feedback.
We checked our database and you are not one of our current or previous clients.
While going through your profile, I see you do not have a legitimate profile picture and this seems to be the only review that you have ever left on Google. Makes us believe that this is either a paid review by competition or someone who is not happy to see iMark grow.

We will also take this opportunity to say a few positive words about iMark:
1. iMark is an “Organization” with 270+ really hard-working professionals dedicated to making each campaign a success.
2. We have hundreds of 5-star testimonials from our clients, which can be seen here: imarkinfotech.com/reviews/
3. As much as we value our clients, we make sure to give equal importance to our employees. Whether it’s a family emergency or a medical mishappening, iMark is always willing to assist its family.
4. We have an extensive collective experience of 25+ years in the industry.
5. iMark also believes in social contribution to society and has a special fund to help the poor and needy in surrounding slums.
6. Additionally, we’re really proud to have 70% of women employees working at iMark.
7. We have 5-star reviews on Clutch.

review.comment: We are really impressed with their Digital media.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind words Shawn. We're glad that we could measure up to your expectation.

review.comment: Great team to work with.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind words Elmer. We're glad that we could measure up to your expectation.

review.comment: "Great place to work , I highly recommend to work here".

Working in iMark is being a great experience and got to nourish my skills and knowledge bank. Culture is enabling and inclusive, and gives good opportunity to have a work life balance.

Lots of employee engagement activities are a part of the workplace culture. Allows growth in various dimensions apart from core job.
Delighted to be a part of iMark's team and glad to have such amazing co-workers !!
Company culture is really good, provides many amenities also, I'm really thankful for iMark.

I have been working here for 7 years. iMark Infotech Pvt. Ltd. is a good place to learn and grow, with the easy and learning-oriented environment. One of the best decision to join here and looking to continue further.

I have been working in iMark Infotech for 6 years now and it has been a wonderful journey. The work environment is great and offers various growth opportunities. With supportive seniors and colleagues, this is a good place for you to enhance your career.

Ishan Sir- CEO of the company-  most intellectual, supportive, encouraging, helpful.
I have been working with iMark for more than a year now. The best part about it is a comfortable working environment. The colleagues are friendly and helpful.
I have been working with this company. The environment of the company is very friendly and welcoming. It’s a great place to start your career.

Since I've joined, I've found this company to be very professional and welcoming. They are all incredibly helpful and responsible.The best part is you can learn lots of new techniques to enhance your skill.

One of the best workplaces with a great environment, great office culture, and management that is always willing to help.

I want to express my gratitude in particular to Mr. Ishan Gupta for having faith in my ability. He establishes a great atmosphere and inspires the team with a lot of positive vibes.

Proud to be part of such organization. Indeed iMark Infotech is great place to work..
I've been working with iMark since 2019. It has been amazing working here.
Working with this company from last 2 years and the journey during this time was great with great opportunities to learn.
Abundant opportunities for career growth and fun, 100% job satisfaction, supportive work environment. I am glad to receive an opportunity to work with iMark Infotech.

Great experienced. I have worked in this company.
Very nice company and the staff is also cooperative.
Ishan sir nature is very nice.
Imark infotech is one of those places where you get an opportunity to learn and grow. The seniors and colleagues are very helpful in providing the guidance.
Excellent work environment and continuous growth opportunities is what makes Imark a perfect workplace. I love to be part of this organization and looking forward to work for many years to come.

Positive work environment. Communication within team is excellent.

It has been a great experience so far, the freedom to work is something that I highly admire here at Imark Infotech Pvt. Ltd.
I 've been exploring something new everyday, which makes my job so dynamic that I've been loving every part of my current duties.
Best company to work in tricity where I got a chance to learn new technologies.

From the very first day when I joined Imark Infotech, the team leader supported me with great care and introduced me to the project I was supposed to handle. Since that day, it’s been a long time I have been working in this organization, and every senior and colleague has been helpful and supportive. Working here never makes me feel tired or depressed. Working here makes me feel great!
Great exposure and excellent teamwork.
Working with this company from last 5 years and the journey during this time was great with great opportunities to learn.
I joined the company and my experience till now has been amazing. The colleagues and seniors are really very supportive and helpful.
Good working culture, motivation, time bound working, good facilities and team work.
Great colleagues and positive environment to work in one of the best companies in tricity.

I am working as a web developer at Imark. The most safest place and a team to work with. Having best seniors to work with who never fail to help you. About owner and HR they never miss a chance to appreciate your efforts.
Great environment, good advancement opportunities.
Company provides good work life balance and healthy environment for learning.
Imark is a great place to learn digital marketing, you get chance to work on live projects. It's going to be a year working here and I would say it's been a great experience working here.
Positive environment and excellent work culture.

During my tenure I learned a lot and enjoyed working with fellow members there. The management is always standing for their employees in their bad times and what else you can expect from a company?

We also have regular activity sessions on our working Saturdays that includes activities like Yoga, Zumba, Volleyball, Cricket, Dumb charades and many more.

Best people and best management to work with!
Excellent workplace and have been working here from last 6 month.. employee friendly compact brings happiness and job satisfaction which lead better stability
I'm so happy to have joined this company. Everyone is very helpful and welcoming.
The work environment at iMark is really great, every body is very supporting and helps you throughout. Overall iMark is the best company with best people's.😄

The people and management in iMark Infotech are consistently encouraging and supporting you to do better. They believe in the concept of willing to learn rather than know it all. There is an easy flow of communication with every level of management.☺️

iMark is definitely a great place to work at because it pushes you to use your potential. Work culture is very supportive and well structured.

Also, it’s a good learning space!

It has been 4 months that I am working with iMark Infotech and I am really glad that i am a part of this organization, iMark is the best place to work with😊 And i really loved the working culture and management. Ishan Sir, Piyush Sir, Shivani Ma'am they all are very supportive, helpful and understanding and also the work environment is very professional They also promote personality development programs and also some fun activities for their employees like knowledgeable sessions, yoga sessions, dance sessions and some more which is ultimately help employees to love working with iMark. Thank-you Ishan Sir for giving me the opportunity to working with iMark 😇😊

I always like an environment that encourages personal development and education. It's a pleasure to work with the iMark team. The team continues to work hard to fulfil its promises. I'm very happy to work with everyone here.
Good place to work.Healthy working environment under good leadership
Good working culture, motivation, good facilities, teamwork, good work coordinator with all employee at Imark infotech. Best for starting your career from the beginning.

I have been working with this company for more than 1.5 years. I have got to learn a lot from Ishaan Sir. The environment of the company is very friendly and welcoming. It’s a great place to start your career.
I am working in iMark since 1 and a half month but it feels like that i am working with iMark from a very long time very friendly environment i loved to being a part of this organization.
